articles.title: Interim U.S. Attorney's Angry Texts To Reporter Revealed
articles.content: Donald Trump-appointed interim U.S. attorney Lindsey Halligan is facing scrutiny after her private messages with a reporter have surfaced. Your reporting isnâ€™t accurate. Waste to even give you a heads up.â€. Bower said that at first, she wondered whether someone posing as Halligan had sent her the messages. Later, she confirmed that it was indeed the interim U.S. attorney who was communicating with her
